__TOC__

A breakdown of QA ISO test cases and their relationship to the various ISO images.

=== ISO Testing Test Cases ===

With a few exceptions the same test cases are used for all the flavours of Ubuntu ISO images. So, by becoming familiar with a few test cases we can be prepared to test most of the ISO images on the QA Testing Tracker. This is an incomplete breakdown of the test cases as they apply to the various ISO images.

The QA team have a <nowiki>[[http://testcases.qa.ubuntu.com/Plans/PRTP|Pre-release Testing Program]]</nowiki> which lists some more detailed tests than those found in the test cases listed below. We can use these when doing ISO image testing towards the final part of the development cycle.
